summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Ayvant IT & Cybersecurity marketing website. All core functionality working correctly with minor issues identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Service selection dropdown options not easily clickable - requires force interaction

integration_issues.issue: Emergency call button missing tel: href attribute

passed_tests: Homepage loads with all sections (hero, services, industries, testimonials, CTA)
Navigation works correctly - all pages accessible via navbar links
Cybersecurity page displays all sections (hero, threats, services, process)
IT Support page displays with support plans and services
IT Consulting page displays consulting services and engagement types
About page displays company info, values, team, and location map
Contact page displays form, contact info, and map
Footer renders with newsletter section and company info
All CTA buttons correctly link to Contact page
Contact form submission works with success message
All GHL placeholder elements exist and are properly positioned
Location maps display correctly on About and Contact pages
Social media links present in footer
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix emergency call button href attribute to include tel: link. Consider improving service dropdown UX for better accessibility.
